so_51820942: for ip in $(cat $filename)
do
  servername=$(dig $nameserver -x $ip +short | sed 's/\.$//')
  echo "set address $servername ip-netmask $ip"
done

so_58210971: find /animals -type d -or -type f \
| grep '/[A-Z]*$' \
| xargs -I + bash -c 'echo -n $(basename +)$( test -d + && echo -n /),\\ ' \
| sed -e 's/, *$//'; echo

FROM debian
RUN mkdir -p /animals
WORKDIR /animals
RUN mkdir -p DOGDIR lowerdir && touch DOGDIR/DOG DOGDIR/lowerDOG2 lowerdir/BIRD
ENTRYPOINT [ "/bin/bash" ]
CMD [ "-c" , "find /animals -type d -or -type f | grep '/[A-Z]*$'| xargs -I + bash -c 'echo -n $(basename +)$( test -d + && echo -n /),\\ ' | sed -e 's/, *$//'; echo"]

ul_83280: while read line

so_23942862: while read -r; do                                 # Read from the file one line at a time
    printf "%s" "$REPLY"                          # Print the line without the newline
    for (( i=1; i<=((58 - ${#REPLY})); i++ )); do # Find the difference in length to iterate
        printf "%s" "0"                           # Pad 0s
    done
    printf "\n"                                   # Add the newline
done < file

su_423338: #!/bin/sh
while read line; do
    printf -- '%s %d\n' "${line}" "${#line}";
done < "${1}"
